trans-unit.source: Accept wire payments by displaying your account details during the checkout.
trans-unit.target: Accepta plati prin transfer bancar si afiseaza detaliile contului tau bancar la finalizarea comenzii.

trans-unit.source: Account details
trans-unit.target: Detalii cont

trans-unit.source: Account details are required.
trans-unit.target: Detaliile contului sunt obligatorii.

trans-unit.source: Account owner
trans-unit.target: Titularul contului

trans-unit.source: Account owner and account details must be configured before using this module.
trans-unit.target: Titularul si detaliile contului trebuie sa fie configurate inainte de a se putea folosi acest modul.

trans-unit.source: Account owner is required.
trans-unit.target: Detaliile titularului de cont sunt obligatorii.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure about removing these details?
trans-unit.target: Sigur doresti sa stergi aceste detali?

trans-unit.source: Bank address
trans-unit.target: Adresa bancii

trans-unit.source: Customization
trans-unit.target: Personalizare

trans-unit.source: Display the invitation to pay in the order confirmation page
trans-unit.target: Afiseaza invitatia de plata in pagina de confirmare a comenzii

trans-unit.source: If the client chooses to pay by bank wire, the order status will change to 'Waiting for Payment'.
trans-unit.target: Daca clientul alege sa plateasca prin transfer bancar, comanda isi va schimba stadiul la "Se asteapta plata."

trans-unit.source: Information on the bank transfer (processing time, starting of the shipping...)
trans-unit.target: Informatii referitoare la transferul bancar (durata de procesare, initierea livrarii...)

trans-unit.source: Information to the customer
trans-unit.target: Informatii pentru client

trans-unit.source: No currency has been set for this module.
trans-unit.target: Nu este setata nicio moneda pentru acest modul.

trans-unit.source: Number of days the items remain reserved
trans-unit.target: Numarul maxim de zile in care articolele pot ramane rezervate

trans-unit.source: Reservation period
trans-unit.target: Perioada de rezervare

trans-unit.source: Such as bank branch, IBAN number, BIC, etc.
trans-unit.target: Precum denumirea bancii, IBAN, BIC, etc.

trans-unit.source: That said, you must manually confirm the order upon receiving the bank wire.
trans-unit.target: Prin urmare, trebuie sa confirmi manual comanda de indata ce primiti confirmarea platii.

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to accept secure payments by bank wire.
trans-unit.target: Acest modul permite acceptarea de plati securizate prin transfer bancar.

trans-unit.source: Wire payment
trans-unit.target: Plata prin transfer

trans-unit.source: Your country's legislation may require you to send the invitation to pay by email only. Disabling the option will hide the invitation on the confirmation page.
trans-unit.target: Legislatia tarii tale iti poate solicita sa trimiti invitatia de plata doar prin e-mail. Dezactivarea optiunii va ascunde invitatia pe pagina de confirmare.
